title: Color Picker Grid Improvements
competitiveRationale: Miro's color picker has smooth hover animations, clear active state indicators, and a well-organized grid layout. Our StickyNode color picker works but the grid is cramped and hover effects are basic.
objective: Improve the color picker dropdown in StickyNode.jsx and ColorSwatchNode.jsx. For StickyNode: increase swatch size from 28px to 32px, increase gap from 6px to 8px, add a subtle ring effect on hover (box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px), and increase padding from 8px to 10px. For ColorSwatchNode: improve the color swatch add panel layout with consistent sizing.

pattern.description: Update the color picker dropdown styles in StickyNode.jsx (around lines 224-267) and similar color selection UI in ColorSwatchNode.jsx
pattern.notes: StickyNode color picker is a grid of color swatches that appears on button click. ColorSwatchNode has a similar color selection UI. Keep the same interaction patterns - just improve the sizing and visual polish.

acceptanceCriteria: StickyNode color picker swatch size increased from 28px to 32px
StickyNode color picker gap increased from 6px to 8px
StickyNode color picker padding increased from 8px to 10px
Color swatches show a ring effect on hover (box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px [color])
ColorSwatchNode color selection UI has consistent sizing with StickyNode
